job_description:
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, AdvanceSoft Inc, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

In this role, a typical day will include:
• Build Salesforce applications/frameworks using Apex, Visualforce, Lightning Component Framework (Aura and LWC) and leverage the full capabilities of the Salesforce platform to support the program
• Implement solutions that adhere to Salesforce platform best practices and perform peer code reviews
• Develop Python scripts that can be used to automate data extraction
• Collaborate with Scrum Teams to estimate, plan, and manage new feature development and testing
• Work with team members to analyze business requirements, translating those requirements in to customized solutions that are highly scalable, extensible, and easy to maintain while keeping the overall end-user experience in mind
• Provide system administration support to customized applications, user permissions, security settings, custom objects, and workflow
• Assist with in-depth analysis of technical problems, suggest short- term and long-term resolutions and an overall roadmap for the completion of this process
• Support post deployment activities including knowledge transfer, process documentation and application bug fixes

WHAT YOU’LL NEED:
• MS/MBA with 6+ years of development experience or BA/BS with 8+ years of development experience
• 2+ years’ experience with Salesforce custom Development using Lightning Components, Visualforce, APEX (SOQL, SOSL)
• 2+ years’ experience on the Salesforce Lightning Platform including Process Builder, Workflows, Lightning App Builder, etc
• 2+ years' of hands-on experience with Python
• Experience with Agile methodologies and frameworks such as, but not limited to: SAFe, Scrum, Kanban
• Have implemented at least one full life cycle project in Lightning and have expert level working knowledge on major Salesforce.com technologies.
• Experienced in web technologies such as HTML, XML, CSS and JavaScript, WSDL
• Experience integrating Salesforce with other applications using SOAP, REST, BULK and Streaming APIs
• Experience with SFDC specific IDE and version control configurations (Github, BitBucket) for Salesforce development (ex: VS Code, IntelliJ, SFDX)
• Working knowledge and experience with complex business systems integration as well as object-oriented design patterns and development
• Provide technical assistance and end user troubleshooting for bug fixes, enhancements, and “how-to” assistance
• Candidate must be able to obtain Public Trust clearance and must have lived in the United States at least three (3) out of the last five (5) years
• or a

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:
• Hands-on Java development experience
• Working knowledge and experience with complex business systems integration as well as object-oriented design patterns and development
• Salesforce.com Certified Platform Developer & Salesforce.com Certified Administrator
• Healthcare Service Industry or Center for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) experience
• Experience working with JIRA, Confluence, and SharePoint
• Experience with infrastructure in a cloud environment (AWS preferred)
• Certified SAFe Agilist, SAFe Practitioner or other Agile certification
• Ability to manage time effectively, to work under time pressure, to meet schedules and deadlines, to multi-task, to plan, organize and prioritize work assignments and pay close attention to detail

Thanks & Regards

Sharu

Remote - Salesforce / Python Developer

Qualifications: MS/MBA with 6+ years of development experience or BA/BS with 8+ years of development experience
2+ years’ experience with Salesforce custom Development using Lightning Components, Visualforce, APEX (SOQL, SOSL)

job_description:
LISA AI, a dynamic start-up in the MVP stage, is a cutting-edge neural network. Aligning with LISA AI is essential for those looking to remain in-demand programmers in elite professional circles. Based in Delaware, our mission is to redefine the people search domain using pioneering artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques. Leading the way is our CEO, a seasoned programmer deeply passionate about our venture.

Your Responsibilities

As a Python Backend Microservices Developer at LISA AI, you will play a pivotal role in the transformation and enhancement of our existing monolithic application.
• Design, implement, and test microservices, especially in the transition of certain API endpoints from PostgreSQL to MongoDB.
• Collaborate closely with the software team to maintain tools and servers integral to our platform.
• Coordinate with system engineers to create documentation vital for platform improvements and expansions.
• Adopt a pragmatic approach to problem-solving, distinguishing between scenarios that demand optimal solutions and those where the best available option suffices.

LISA AI is Looking For

We seek a passionate developer with a Bachelor's or Master's degree in a field relevant to software development, accompanied by:
• At least 3-6 years of experience in microservices development.
• Expertise in Python, FastAPI, and MongoDB.
• Familiarity with Kafka, Pydantic, and messaging systems.
• A solid understanding of software best practices, like SOLID principles, TDD, git usage, and unit testing.
• Outstanding verbal and written communication skills, as English is our primary language of operation.
• Fluent Russian language.

Bonus Points For:
• Experience transitioning monolithic applications to a microservices architecture.
• Prior work on platforms or tools focused on recruitment or people search.
• Familiarity with machine learning applications within backend systems.

LISA AI Team

Comprising a passionate group of 4 professionals, the LISA AI team is driven by a shared ambition and the urge to bring about a paradigm shift in the employment realm. We embrace agile methodologies, punctuated by frequent strategy evaluations and brainstorming sessions. Although you'll report to our CTO, our flat organizational structure means that everyone's inputs are valued, and collaborative efforts reign supreme.

The Offer

By joining LISA AI, you become an integral part of a start-up where every effort directly correlates to the company's growth trajectory. Our work environment promotes teamwork, autonomy, and perpetual learning. In addition to a competitive salary, we assure flexible hours and considerable autonomy in role execution.

Qualifications: We seek a passionate developer with a Bachelor's or Master's degree in a field relevant to software development, accompanied by:
At least 3-6 years of experience in microservices development
Expertise in Python, FastAPI, and MongoDB
Familiarity with Kafka, Pydantic, and messaging systems
A solid understanding of software best practices, like SOLID principles, TDD, git usage, and unit testing
Outstanding verbal and written communication skills, as English is our primary language of operation
Fluent Russian language
Experience transitioning monolithic applications to a microservices architecture
Prior work on platforms or tools focused on recruitment or people search
Familiarity with machine learning applications within backend systems
Responsibilities: As a Python Backend Microservices Developer at LISA AI, you will play a pivotal role in the transformation and enhancement of our existing monolithic application
Design, implement, and test microservices, especially in the transition of certain API endpoints from PostgreSQL to MongoDB
Collaborate closely with the software team to maintain tools and servers integral to our platform
Coordinate with system engineers to create documentation vital for platform improvements and expansions
Adopt a pragmatic approach to problem-solving, distinguishing between scenarios that demand optimal solutions and those where the best available option suffices
Benefits: In addition to a competitive salary, we assure flexible hours and considerable autonomy in role execution

Python Developer

We are looking for Strong Python Developer to join our team and help us develop and maintain various software products.

The ideal candidate should have a strong background in software development and be comfortable working with a variety of programming languages, including Python.

write 4-6 scheduling functions (almost similer logic)

do error handling for existing functions

convert firebase api calls to transations

write error handling logic to existing functions

verify and test existing api calls

write code to integrate payments api function

All the jobs needs to be done in 3 days.

You need to actively collaborate with me though video call.

Must have most time devoted to this task during these days
